About

folks from the Apple Education Team. I have always been fascinated by technology and especially tools for helping people learn and grow.

I got a Masterâ€™s degree in IT Management from Regis University. Before that, I was an undergraduate at Binghamton University in New York. I still like to tinker and explore with code, hacker culture, and human-computer interaction in general.
